about_the_game:
Craft, upgrade and race your way through a post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies and enemy cars. Build the ultimate vehicle and equip it with powerful weapons to smash through obstacles and take out mad bots. Can you survive the wasteland and become the ultimate racer?

THE AI HAS GONE MAD AND PUT THE WORLD INTO CHAOS!

Fight hordes of bot racers capable of destroying all life in their path. You will overcome them only with your agility, skillful driving and... a powerful guns!

EXPERIMENT TO YOUR OWN STYLE

Build and customize your own vehicle to suit your wishes and needs. Find your approach to destroying enemies and breaking obstacles.

ARCADE COMBAT RACING

The path to success is possible through the selection and timing of abilities, precise drifting in the corners and adapting to the dynamic track environment. Prepare and react with lightning speed!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Most Linux distributions should work)
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.12+
  • Processor: 2 core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Fury Race is a single player racing roguelite auto-shooter. Gear up your car by arsenal of various weapons, take on hordes of walking dead and unlock powerful upgrades. Max your power and destroy mad riders of the wasteland!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
